overview: Teacher Hall has a new cadet who passes the initiation test with flying colors! Blind folded before the platoon, he's forced to beat off...and eventually gets plowed by the horny Qusartermaster! After the "Commencement Sexercise," everyone gets into the hot act with a dynamic graduation orgy!
tagline: The young cadet learned the ropes the hard way!
title: The Boarding School Hero
